thread.title: Slavisa Jokanovic has agreed new deal to stay as Fulham boss until 2019
thread.title_full: Slavisa Jokanovic has agreed new deal to stay as Fulham boss until 2019

author: gsweet
title: Slavisa Jokanovic has agreed new deal to stay as Fulham boss until 2019
text:
Let's slav ya Slavisa Jokanovic has agreed new deal to stay as Fulham boss until 2019 
Owner Shahid Khan has also appointed his son Tony as vice-chairman and director of football at Craven Cottage By GEOFF SWEET Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments FULHAM manager Slavisa Jokanovic has signed a two-year extension to his contract that keeps him at the club until 2019. 
And Fuham owner Shahid Khan has also appointed his son Tony Khan as vice-chairman and director of football. Reuters 3 Slavisa Jokanovic has signed a new deal at Fulham 
Fulham’s 2-0 win at Bristol City on Wednesday pushed them up into seventh place in the Championship, six points shy of a play-off spot. 
Keep up to date with ALL the EFL news, gossip and transfers on our club page 
Jokanovic, 48, who joined the Whites in December 2015, has been linked with Malaga and Werder Bremen. 
“This is a fantastic Club full of history and tradition and I am proud to be part of that and hopefully to add a little to the story,” Jokanovic told fulhamfc.com. Related Stories Rooney to stay Wayne Rooney confirms he has rejected mega-money offers from Chinese clubs and is staying at Man United UP FOR THE CUP Southampton beware... Jose Mourinho has won ten of his 12 showpiece finals with four clubs and only they stand in his way again Bolasie blow Everton star Yannick Bolasie set to be sidelined until 2018 as he prepares for second knee op kyl any hope Arsenal transfer blow as it emerges Monaco star Kylian Mbappe had posters of Real Madrid on his bedroom wall as a kid Only Ron for me Henrik Larsson turned down 30 clubs to join Barca... where Ronaldinho told him he was his 'idol' Keep 'em grounded Juventus stars stuck in Porto after flight back to Italy cancelled due to 'technical failure' with plane 
“We’ve built an identity our fans can relate to which has brought us closer to our targets, which is exciting for the future of the Club and for those fans who deserve to see the good times of elite football being played back at the Cottage again.” PA:Press Association Jokanovic has taken to Fulham to seventh in the Championship PA:Press Association 3 Owner Shahid Khan has appointed his son Tony vice-chairman 
Tony Khan had previously advised the club’s scouting department, offering his expertise with his knowledge of statistics. His analytical brand of scouting was implemented over the summer, leading to the Cottagers’ impressive off season transfer window. 
He said: “My No 1 priority for months has been working toward an extension that keeps Slav at Fulham. Harry Kane scores a hat-trick against Fulham in the FA Cup fifth round "I'm personally and professionally thrilled that we have an agreement with Slav and I know Fulham supporters are right there with me. "Slav has been sensational for Fulham but he's far from satisfied, and that's just the ambition and direction we need to reach our goals. I look forward to working with Slav and a bright future for our club."
